name: Flippy Jump
summary: You close the door of your refrigerator and an interesting life begins inside. Fruits and vegetables try to escape from this big white cage. Break everything around you and smash through shelves to find a way out. The more precise the timing of the jump, the more powerful the impact. That's exactly what you need to succeed! Try to get out all the fruits and vegetables out of the fridge. Carrot, cucumber, sausage, and even a spoon for some reason.
